column3: 2015 phyllis mc. creary age 54 of huntsville
column6: 2015 at fairview nursing home and rehab in birmingham. she was born january 12
column7: 1961 to w. l. and lucille taylor in arab
column8: al. she is survived by her son: brad grindle of arab; brother: howard taylor of arab; sister: reba cole of arab; one granddaughter; and a host of nieces and nephews. she was preceded in death by her husband: bryant mc. creary; parents: w. l. taylor and lucille taylor conners; and brothers: winford h. taylor and edward taylor. funeral service will be tuesday
column10: 2015 at 2:00 p. m. at gober funeral chapel with rev. jimmy hammaker officiating. burial will be in brashier's chapel cemetery. visitation will be tuesday from 12:00 p. m. until service time at 2:00. pallbearers will be david pierce
column14: chase cole and drew sheilds. upcoming events. visitationjun 23. 12:00 pm - 2:00 pm gober funeral chapel1331 guntersville road. arab
